titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 178) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 1997 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal year 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-577, by Mr. Solomon.
Rule provides for consideration of H. Con. Res. 178. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 223.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 196 (Roll no. 175).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/15/1996--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Con. Res. 178 (congressional budget).
